page.title: 02KETTLE PRODUCE
page.content: {Kettle Produce}have propelled themselves to the{forefront}of farming in{Scotland.Suppliers to Marks and {Spencers and Littlewoods}it is the {largest}vegetable farm in{Scotland exporting to{France}and other {E.E.C.countries.}Situated in the fertile{Howe of Fife, Kettle Produce have developed{intensive agricultural {technology}to{boost}yields of their {staple crops_lettuce,cabbage,sprouts, {cauliflower,brocolli, carrots and {turnip.Insecticides}and{fertilisers have banished crop rotation,modern machinery has taken the backache out of vegetable farming.In{Spring}the fields are a sea of{polythene}bringing planting dates{forward,irrigation & {fertilisers}mean{4 crops a year.Around {200 people}are employed in the packing facility.The{new harvester}can pack so vegetables reach shops the{same day.
